components.name: Alert
components.notes: Figma has 7 alert variants. Vue component exists but needs review for status/variant alignment (success, error, warning, info)

components.name: Button
components.notes: Figma has 40 variants with Type, Status, Size, Leading icon parameters. Vue has primary/secondary/tertiary/action props. Comprehensive audit needed for variant coverage

components.name: Checkbox
components.notes: Selection section includes checkboxes with various states. Vue component exists; verify coverage of all state variants

components.name: Confirm Dialog
components.notes: Figma has 3 modal variants. Vue Confirm component exists; ensure alignment with modal patterns

components.name: Datepicker
components.notes: Input Fields section covers text, email, number, password, select. Datepicker likely subset. Need to verify coverage

components.name: Dropdown
components.notes: Figma has Dropdown-base (54) and Specific Dropdown (17) sections. Vue Select component exists but may need variants for different dropdown types

components.name: Dropdown - Specific
components.notes: Specialized dropdown implementations (category, country, language, role, etc.). May need dedicated components or variant props in FTSelect

components.name: Floating Label Input
components.notes: Input Fields section includes floating label patterns. Vue component exists; verify all input states covered

components.name: Image Picker
components.notes: 40 variants in Figma. No corresponding Vue component. Evaluate need and create if essential for FastTrack

components.name: Input Field
components.notes: 38 variants with Type (text, email, number, password, select) and State parameters. Vue has FTInput; verify all input types covered

components.name: Navigation Bar
components.notes: 39 nav bar variants. Vue Navbar exists; ensure responsive variants and positioning options align

components.name: Modal
components.notes: Only 3 modal variants in Figma. Vue Modal component exists; may need more variants or composition patterns

components.name: Notification
components.notes: Alert section maps to Notification composable in Vue. FTAlert component likely used; verify composable integration

components.name: Options Selector
components.notes: 76 quick access item variants. Vue component exists; verify option types and selection patterns

components.name: Pagination
components.notes: 6 pagination variants. Vue Paging component exists; verify variant coverage for different page states

components.name: Panel
components.notes: 13 panel variants. Vue Panel component exists; verify container and layout options

components.name: Placeholder
components.notes: 6 placeholder/skeleton variants in Figma. No Vue component. Consider if skeleton loaders needed

components.name: Radio Button
components.notes: Selection section includes radio buttons. Vue component exists; verify all state variants

components.name: Sliding Panel
components.notes: Part of Panel section. Verify sliding/drawer behavior implementation

components.name: Split View
components.notes: Part of Panel section. Verify layout and resizing capabilities

components.name: Spinner
components.notes: 10 smaller components include spinner/loader. Vue component exists; verify animation variants

components.name: Table
components.notes: 25 table variants with column and state parameters. Vue component exists; verify sortable, paginated, row-action variants

components.name: Tabs
components.notes: 32 tab variants. Vue component exists; verify vertical/horizontal, disabled, and badge support

components.name: Tag
components.notes: 49 tag and status variants. No dedicated Vue component. Consider if separate Tag component needed or part of other components

components.name: Tooltip
components.notes: 41 tooltip and data balloon variants. Vue component exists; verify positioning, triggers, and content types

components.name: Toggle
components.notes: 12 toggle switch variants for modals. No dedicated Vue component. Verify if needed as standalone or modal-specific

components.name: Card
components.notes: 17 card component layouts. No Vue component. Could be composition of Panel + other components

components.name: Flag
components.notes: 261 country flag components. Likely used as assets/icons. Consider image-based or icon-library approach

components.name: Quick Access Item
components.notes: 76 quick access variants. Maps to FTOptionsSelector; verify all item types and interactions

vueOnlyComponents.notes: Vue has specific Confirm component. Verify if distinct from FTModal or if it's a Modal variant
